Upload Image File

Click the Browse button to select an image from your personal computer. After you have selected the desired image file, click the Submit button to upload it. The image file must be no larger than 4MB in size and must be a .jpg, .png, or .gif file.
Your uploaded Image will be displayed in less than 1 minute.
